Package control

Class StudentController

java.lang.Object
control.StudentController
public class StudentController
extends java.lang.Object
StudentController contains the logic to realise use case of the options given to the student in the StudentUI.

    StudentController()

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentController

      public StudentController()

  • Method Details

    • addCourse

      public static void addCourse​(Student student) throws CourseIndexNotFoundException, CourseClashingException, ExistingCourseException, IllegalAUWeightageException
      Adds a new course not found in the student's record by asking the user for course index as input. Ensures that the course either exists or does not clash with student's schedule.
      Parameters:
      student - student object
      Throws:
      CourseIndexNotFoundException - Exception thrown when the user inputs an invalid course index
      CourseClashingException - Exception thrown when the course is clashing with another course in student's schedule
      ExistingCourseException - Exception thrown when user has registered for the same course / course index.
      IllegalAUWeightageException - Exception thrown when the total AU taken exceeds 21 AUs.

    • dropCourse

      public static void dropCourse​(Student student) throws CourseIndexNotFoundException
      Drops an existing course found in the student's record by asking the user for course index as input. Updates the database according to the student's request.
      Parameters:
      student - student object
      Throws:
      CourseIndexNotFoundException - Exception thrown when the user inputs an invalid course index

    • printRegisteredCourses

      public static void printRegisteredCourses​(Student student)
      Prints out registered courses under the student found in the database
      Parameters:
      student - student object

    • checkCourseVacancy

      public static void checkCourseVacancy() throws CourseIndexNotFoundException
      Checks the number of vacancies in a course.
      Throws:
      CourseIndexNotFoundException - Exception thrown when the user inputs an invalid course index

    • changeIndex

      public static void changeIndex​(Student student) throws CourseClashingException, CourseIndexFullException, ExistingCourseException, IllegalCourseChangeException, CourseIndexNotFoundException
      Changing of existing index found in the student's database and ensure that the new index the student is changing to, belongs to the same course code. Ensure that the new course index do not clash with the student's schedule as well.
      Parameters:
      student - student object
      Throws:
      CourseClashingException - Exception thrown when the course is clashing with another course in student's schedule
      CourseIndexFullException - Exception thrown if you try to register to a course indexthat has no vancancy left.
      ExistingCourseException - Exception thrown when user has registered for the same course / course index.
      IllegalCourseChangeException - Exception thrown when the course index the user is trying to change to is from a different course code.
      CourseIndexNotFoundException - Exception thrown when the user inputs an invalid course index

    • swapIndex

      public static void swapIndex​(Student student) throws CourseClashingException, IllegalCourseChangeException
      Swaps index with an existing student found in the database. Done by keying in the other student's username and password. Ensure that both the index are registered by both students and that the index belong to the same course code.
      Parameters:
      student - student object
      Throws:
      CourseClashingException - Exception thrown when the course is clashing with another course in student's schedule
      IllegalCourseChangeException - Exception thrown when the course index the user is trying to change to is from a different course code.
